biotools.summary: Reference-free profiling of polyploid genomes | We have developed GenomeScope 2.0, which applies classical insights from combinatorial theory to establish a detailed mathematical model of how k-mer frequencies will be distributed in heterozygous and polyploid genomes | Average k-mer coverage for polyploid genome | Upload results from running Jellyfish or KMC
